title: send
description: Data to trigger the email report

job.description: The job name associated with the object

kernel.description: The kernel name associated with the object

lab_name.description: The name of the lab to trigger the report for

boot_report.description: Whether the boot report should be created and sent

build_report.description: Whether the build report should be created and sent

boot_send_to.description: The emails to sent the boot report to

boot_send_cc.description: The emails to sent the boot report to in carbon copy

boot_send_bcc.description: The emails to sent the boot report to in blind carbon copy

build_send_to.description: The emails to send the build report to

build_send_cc.description: The emails to send the build report to in carbon copy

build_send_bcc.description: The emails to send the build report to in blind carbon copy

send_to.description: The emails to send the reports to, will be appended to the more specific email control values

send_cc.description: The emails to send the reports to in carbon copy, will be appended to the more specific email control values

send_bcc.description: The emails to send the reports to in blind carbon copy, will be appended to the more specific email control values

in_reply_to.description: The message ID of the previous message this email report is a reply

delay.description: The number of seconds after which the email should be sent

subject.description: The subject for the email: overrides the default one. If sending both boot and build reports, the same subject will be used for both emails.
